DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the postprandial glycemia and insulinemia caused by boiled potato with blue-fleshed or yellow-fleshed tubers, or a gel prepared with bilberries and potato starch, is studied in healthy males. Additionally, the appearance and metabolism of the flavonoids and their metabolites is studied in plasma and urine.
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability of Anthocyanins of Blue Potatoes as Compared With Bilberries
